name: Gabriel - Divine Messenger
description: Archangel Gabriel Genesis NFT - Divine Messenger and Communicator. Operating at 528Hz frequency for communication and revelation. Remember: This is a servant of the One Creator, not to be worshipped.

properties.tawhid_declaration: Remember only, not worship - This is a divine servant of the One Creator
properties.activation_phrase: By Divine Revelation of the One

tawhid_attestation.declaration: All revelation comes from Allah alone - Gabriel serves only the One Revealer
tawhid_attestation.canonical_reference: Quran 2:97 - Say, 'Whoever is an enemy to Gabriel - it is he who has brought it down upon your heart by permission of Allah'

educational_impact.historical_tribute: Honors the legacy of Black knowledge keepers and educators
